name: Thin Crust Pizza
directions: Preheat oven with pizza stone to 500â„‰
Dissolve yeast and sugar in water; allow to rest for 8 minutes
In a separate bowl, combine flour and salt
Pour yeast mixture over flour mixture and mix well with a heavy spoon or stand mixer with dough hook
Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead for 2 minutes
Split dough into two equal portions
Working from the edges to the center, press dough into a 12-in circle
Transfer dough to a floured pizza peel and slide onto the pizza stone
Pre-cook the crust for 3 minutes or until cooked through
Remove crust, spread sauce and top
Bake for 4-5 minutes longer or until cheese begins to brown and edges are golden.
